messages.title: SUPPORTING OUR POLICE
messages.content: Nick will oppose police station closures in Broxtowe.

messages.title: UPGRADING OUR NHS
messages.content: Upgrade QMC A&E, more local GPs.

messages.title: COMMUNITY SUPPORT
messages.content: Argue for local community support officers and against police cutbacks.

messages.title: INVESTMENT & JOBS
messages.content: Fight for local investment and jobs, particularly for young people.

messages.title: PUTTING BROXTOWE FIRST
messages.content: Putting local services before tax breaks for billionaires.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick will oppose police station closures in Broxtowe.
Upgrade QMC A&E, more local GPs.
Fight for local investment and jobs, prioritising opportunities for young people.
Safeguard decent local jobs against Tory cuts.
Putting local services before tax breaks for billionaires.

issues.economy: Fight for local investment and jobs.
issues.health: Upgrade QMC A&E, more local GPs.

leaflet.personalStatement: Nick loves Broxtowe - let's win it back!

politicalExperience.achievements: Delivered investment, saved jobs, stopped the tram wrecking Beeston High Road.

quotes.text: This is a real chance to make a difference for you and your family. I'd be proud to win back Broxtowe on May 7th and serve you again.
